extends Filter<T>

        Creates a new filter, which applies to item sets.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent o fhte filter as an instance of the generic type FilterType or null, if no parent is available
        predicate - The predicate, which should be used to test items, as an instance of the type Predicate. The predicate may not be null

public final @NotNull Filter.ItemSetFilter bySupport(double minSupport)
        Sets the minimum support, which must be reached by an item set to be accepted by the filter.
        Parameters:
        minSupport - The minimum support, which should be set, as a Double value. The minimum support must be at least 0
        Returns:
        The filter, this method has been called upon, as an instance of the class Filter.ItemSetFilter. The filter may not be null

      • bySupport

        @NotNull
public final @NotNull Filter.ItemSetFilter bySupport(double minSupport,
                                                              double maxSupport)
        Sets the minimum and maximum support, which must be reached by an item set to be accepted by the filter.
        Parameters:
        minSupport - The minimum support, which should be set, as a Double value. The minimum support must be at least 0
        maxSupport - The maximum support, which should be set, as a Double value. The maximum support must be at least the minimum support and at maximum 1
        Returns:
        The filter, this method has been called upon, as an instance of the class Filter.ItemSetFilter. The filter may not be null

        Parameters:
        minSize - The minimum size, which should be set, as an Integer value. The minimum size must be at least 0
